name: Tank RTS
description:
Features:

- Different terrain types, which make the units move slower

- Pathfinding

- The player can set the target for an army multiple times

- Tanks shoot automatically when they see an enemy

Controls:

- WASD / arrow keys - scroll the map

- Mouse wheel - zoom

- Left mouse button click - select a unit

- Drag left mouse button - draw a selection box

- Right mouse button - set a target destination for all selected units

- SHIFT + 1..9 - create a control group with all selected units

- 1..9 (without SHIFT) - select all units from that control group
